title: Silver 4 player looking a team to join to improve and experience being in a team
body:
Hey

I am a silver 4 player in OCE just wanting to get better and also learn team dynamics and drafting as well anything else that's comes with being a team. 

I am a Top/ADC main but can play mid and support. The only position I am not good in is jungle. Add me on discord or reply to this post if you have something I might be interested in :)

Stormfire777 #7139

replies.body: Im S2, created a club, kamikaze bug wanna join?
Silver 3 last season looking to also improve with a team i'm pretty much a top main
